title: Google Analytics Expert Needed with A lot of Wordpress Experience
description:
We have a custom Wordpress e-commerce site (via Woocommerce) that we've attached several Google Tags to be tracked with GA4.

We want to track where the customers fall off during our 4-step onboarding and checkout, as well as understanding where the customers are visiting the site from (organic vs. meta ads etc)

The site we've built is quite custom and so we need someone with significant experience combining Wordpress and Google Analytics (GA4).

The data that we have currently, with the pixels and header code is not accurate. Inaccurate data is worse than nothing, so we need it fixed by an expert ASAP.

We are open to a long-term, profitable contract with a talented analytics professional.

title: Personal and Executive Assistant for Business and Administrative Support (Fully Remote)
description:
Are you a highly organized and detail-oriented Personal and Executive Assistant with a passion for project management and administrative support? Do you excel at managing both business and personal tasks with efficiency and discretion? If so, we want you on our team!

Working Arrangement:
This is a fully remote position. While you will have flexible working hours, some overlap with Eastern Time Zone (mornings or evenings) is ideal for effective alignment and communication.

Key Responsibilities:
•Calendar Management: Schedule and coordinate meetings, appointments, and events. Set reminders for important dates and deadlines.

•Email Management: Sort and prioritize emails, draft and respond to emails on behalf of the executive, and organize the inbox to maintain clarity and focus.

•Meeting Preparation and Coordination: Prepare agendas, record and distribute meeting minutes, and coordinate with participants to ensure meetings run smoothly.

•Project Management: Track project progress, coordinate with team members to ensure tasks are completed on time, and manage project documentation and reports.

•Document Preparation: Create and edit documents, presentations, and reports. Ensure all documents are formatted correctly and free of errors, and handle confidential information with discretion.

•Research: Conduct research and prepare concise summaries on various topics.

•Admin Tasks: Assist with personal and business tasks as needed.

•Organization and Process Setup: Help organize Google Drive and Docs, ensuring files are systematically stored and easy to access. Set up and optimize processes to improve workflow and efficiency.

•Recruitment/Hiring Assistance: Schedule and coordinate candidate interviews, screen and assess candidate profiles, facilitate communication between candidates and hiring managers, and provide onboarding and payroll processing support.

Key Competencies:
•Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
•Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.
•Proactive, self-starter attitude with a focus on problem-solving.
•Discretion in handling confidential information.

Tech Savviness:
•Proficiency in G Suite (Google Calendar, Docs, Sheets, Slides, Drive, Gmail, Forms, Meet) and Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, Teams, PowerPoint).

•Experience with project management tools such as Notion, Asana, Trello, or Monday.com.

•Familiarity with communication tools like Slack or Zoom for effective remote collaboration.

•Understanding of cloud-based file management systems like Dropbox or Google Drive.

•Proficiency in time management and productivity apps such as Todoist, ClickUp, Microsoft To Do, or Evernote.

•Basic knowledge of CRM tools (e.g., HubSpot, Salesforce) is a plus.

•Experience with AI tools such as ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, Google Bard, and others for research, recaps, and creative problem-solving. The ability to leverage these tools in innovative ways to streamline tasks and enhance productivity is highly desirable.


Why Work With Me?
•Opportunity to work on a variety of tasks and projects.
•Flexible working hours with some overlap in the Eastern Time Zone.
•Potential for long-term collaboration and professional growth.


How to Apply: If you are an experienced Personal or Executive Assistant with a passion for organization, project management, and leveraging AI to enhance productivity, I would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume, a brief cover letter explaining why you would be a great fit for this role, and any relevant work samples.
estimate_desc: Hourly: $3.50 - $20.00-Expert-Est. time: More than 6 months, 30+ hrs/week-

title: Social media marketing

Qualifications:
Proven experience in social media marketing, particularly in creating engaging content.

Why Join Us?

If you’re ready to make an impact and grow with us, please send your resume and a brief cover letter. We can’t wait to hear from you!

I am looking for a business consultant who has experience founding, developing, and running a SaaS mobile app on iOS.

I am planning to launch my first startup business, a iOS mobile app, and I’m looking for someone to consult me before I get started.

I’m looking to:

title: Real Estate Photography Editor
description:
I am looking for a highly skilled real estate photo editor for my real estate photography business. I am looking for someone who is available to begin immediately and can provide high quality content consistently. Consistency is extremely important for me.  I normally have about 2-3+  sets of photos (30-60 images) per shoot. I need someone with a 12 hour delivery time, no questions about that it has to be fast. 

I am not looking for a beginner editor in terms of this position. I need someone who is fast and very accurate. I do not want to have to correct white balance and other minor errors that should be done right the first time. Good communication is an absolute must and I want to be sure I can rely on you to have the work done at a reasonable time. 

I normally will upload photos around 3 pm - 6pm in the evening and I would like to have them by 7 am the following morning. I shoot a lot of high end homes and need the right editor to grow with my company. I would love to see a portfolio of your work prior and would like to have you test 3-4 photos of mine from my last shoot to test your quality of work. 

If you are a skilled video editor that would be a huge plus but not extremely important as I am looking for a video editor specifically as well. Looking forward to hearing from you! Let's grow together.
estimate_desc: Hourly: $15.00 - $30.00-Expert-Est. time: Less than 1 month, Less than 30 hrs/week-

title: Discord Bot for OCR and Spreadsheet
description:
Small gaming guild needs a Discord bot that can perform Optical Character Recognition (OCR) on a series of images (typically 12-16 per batch) and generate a single spreadsheet (CSV) with the extracted text. This is for tracking daily data for members of the guild, which helps us to rank them in order to decide who receives a reward after 3 months. Ideally we'd like to specify which parts of the screenshot are scanned to optimize the daily reporting process. 

The bot should be able to analyze a batch of images shared in a designated channel and automatically extract text from them, then organize the text into a structured spreadsheet format. 

Skills required:
- Discord bot development
- Optical Character Recognition (OCR)
- Image processing
- Spreadsheet generation (CSV)

title: Hiring SEO Professional or Agency with Proven Experience in Gambling and Betting Niche
description:
I am looking for a seasoned SEO professional or agency to handle comprehensive SEO tasks for my website, focusing on increasing Domain Authority (DA) and Page Authority (PA). This includes both on-page and off-page SEO, with a strong emphasis on acquiring high-quality backlinks.

Requirements:

Experience in Gambling and Betting Industry:

Only apply if you have a proven track record of working within the gambling and betting niche.
Please provide case studies or examples of previous work where you successfully improved the SEO metrics (DA, PA, keyword rankings, traffic) for gambling or betting websites.
On-Page SEO:

Conduct a full audit of the website to identify and fix any on-page SEO issues.
Optimize meta titles, descriptions, headings, and content with targeted keywords.
Ensure proper internal linking structure and optimize page speed for better user experience.
Implement schema markup and structured data as needed.
Off-Page SEO:

Develop and execute a strategy for acquiring high-quality, relevant backlinks.
Focus on building links from reputable websites within the gambling and betting niche.
Utilize various off-page SEO techniques like guest posting, outreach, and content marketing to enhance link profile.
Keyword Research and Content Optimization:

Perform in-depth keyword research to identify high-potential keywords.
Optimize existing content and create new content targeting these keywords.
Regularly update and refresh content to maintain relevance.
Reporting and Transparency:

Provide regular reports detailing the progress of DA and PA, keyword rankings, backlink acquisition, and overall SEO performance.
Be transparent about the strategies being implemented and the results being achieved.
Budget and Timeline:

Please provide a detailed quote for your services, including a breakdown of costs for on-page and off-page SEO.
Specify the expected timeline for achieving significant improvements in DA, PA, and overall SEO performance.
How to Apply:

Submit your proposal, including your previous work, strategies you plan to implement, and a timeline for expected results.
Include references or testimonials from clients within the gambling and betting industry.
Important Note:

Applications without proven experience in the gambling and betting niche will not be considered.
I am looking for someone who can demonstrate tangible results in improving SEO metrics within this specific industry.
Looking forward to working with a professional who can deliver exceptional results.
estimate_desc: Hourly-Expert-Est. time: 3 to 6 months, Less than 30 hrs/week-

title: Professionals Only:  Custom WordPress Development for Travel Agency Website
description:

We are seeking an experienced WordPress developer to build a custom website for a travel agency. The project requires replicating a Figma design into a fully functional website. Here are the key details:

Design: We will provide Figma designs day by day. You must translate these designs into pixel-perfect CSS and HTML.
Responsiveness: The site must be fully responsive and look perfect on all devices.

Payment Integration: Add payment methods such as PayPal and Stripe.

Features: The website will include a section for digital PDF tour plan sales. No individual services like hotel bookings or daily tours will be featured—only tour packages.

Reference: You can refer to FTLO Travel for design inspiration.
Requirements:

Proven experience in creating custom WordPress sites from Figma designs.

Ability to deliver a pixel-perfect, responsive website.
Experience integrating payment gateways like PayPal and Stripe.

Ability to share references or previous work with validation.

Important: If you have successfully completed similar projects on your own, please apply. If this is your first experience with such a project, please do not apply.

To apply, share links to your previous work with your name and ensure that the projects are verified.

Thank you!

title: Writer to read middle school science texts, and create basic student resources.
description: I am a middle school teacher that has moved to a small school district. I went from teaching 1 subject all day, to 6 different subjects, and I am overwhelmed and need some help. I am looking to outsource the creation of some resources based on our textbooks. These resources are very simple, but somewhat time consuming. There are 3 units from 3 middle school science texts, 6th, 7th, and 8th grade (attached). The units are divided into lessons, and contain about 3-5 lessons per unit. I need the lessons in the units read, and about 2 basic reading comprehension questions created per page on a Word document (example attached). The units average about 20 pages of middle school level reading, and would average about 16 questions per lesson. The goal is to just have basic reading comprehension questions to answer as the students read. Each unit also contains vocabulary words, (about 20) and I need those words made into a matching vocabulary quiz for each unit, also on a Word document (example attached). All I did in the resources I have created so far, is I read each page and tried to come up with a basic reading comprehension question. I try for two per page, but sometimes there is only 1 paragraph and I can only get one question, and some pages are longer and require about 3 questions. I need questions from the text only, not from any of the images, math toolboxes, etc..., just the printed text. For the vocabulary I just combine all of the vocabulary at the start of each lesson in the unit (not the academic vocabulary also listed), put them in order on the left of a Word document, and the definitions from the glossary on the right (not in order) with letters for matching, as you can see in the example. The work is very simple, and the skills required would be excellent English reading skills, the ability to create decent basic reading comprehension questions for middle school students from existing text, ability to use/have access to Microsoft Word, with basic knowledge of Word formatting. This job posting is for 3 units, one from each grade level. I would estimate that all of this could be completed easily in one or two days. I will have many more units I will need the same resources for, so if the price is right and the work good, I would prefer to use someone who is already trained for the remaining units. I just don't have time to scan all of the pages for all 3 textbooks at once.
estimate_desc: Hourly: $7.00 - $20.00-Entry Level-Est. time: Less than 1 month, Less than 30 hrs/week-

Please submit your resume and answers to the questions asked. 

There is room for growth here in a long-term remote role.  This can include profit sharing, paid time off, and other benefits! We love our team and take care of them.

Walcraft Cabinetry is a Christ-centered business working towards making an impact on this world by using our funds for social impact initiatives. We are a team of dedicated professionals from all over the world. Ready to join a team that cares for one another as we strive for a greater purpose? Let's do it!

Sean Walsh
CEO - Walcraft Cabinetry

I am going to start with one product for now but would like the shop to be setup in a way in which I can scale to multiple products rather quickly. I'd also like help setiing up all of the apps I will need to integrate with to launch a successful brand. I'm currently waiting on the sample products to be shipped to me so I am waiting on product images before being able to fully setup my site. I wanted to reach out to Shopify developers a head of time so we are ready to go when I get all the photos needed.

Websites I like

title: Create an automated workflow for daily news digest
description:
We have a network of around 30 partner organizations that regularly publish news articles on their respective websites. We're looking to build a tool that:

1. **Web Scraping**: Automatically scrapes these partner websites daily to collect newly published articles.
2. **Content Organization**: Classifies the scraped articles by topic using NLP or similar technologies.
3. **Content Summarization**: Abbreviates the full-length articles into concise summaries to create a daily news digest.
4. **Multi-Format Output**:
    - **Text**: Short-form, 1-minute or less briefings suitable for social media.
    - **Audio**: Text-to-speech generation to create audio versions of these briefings, with a preference for natural-sounding AI voices.
    - **Video**: Convert these summaries into branded generative videos using a service like Lumen5.

5. **Author Attribution**: Include author attributions in the briefings wherever possible.

6. **Publication & Distribution**:
    - **Short-form Briefings**: Publish across social media channels.
    - **Longer-form Content**: Combine multiple briefings into a longer video and podcast format for publication on our website.

### Automation Goals:

We aim to automate as much of this process as possible, from scraping and classification to content summarization, media generation (audio and video), and publication. The end goal is to streamline the workflow, minimizing manual intervention while ensuring high-quality, branded content is produced daily.
estimate_desc: Hourly: $25.00 - $50.00-Expert-Est. time: 1 to 3 months, Less than 30 hrs/week-

title: UAE/Dubai sourcing and shipping agent to UK
description:
ob Post: Dubai/UAE-Based Freelancer Needed for Wholesale Perfume Procurement and Shipping to the UK

I am seeking a reliable and resourceful freelancer based in Dubai/UAE who can help me access wholesale prices for high-quality perfume products and ship them to the UK via DDP air/express at competitive rates.

Responsibilities:

Source and procure perfumes at wholesale prices from reputable local suppliers.
Ensure access to top brands such as Lattafa, Maison Alhambra, and other similar high-quality Dubai perfume brands.
Locate and purchase a specific brand called 'Volare,' available at Mamlakat Al Oud Trading LLC, next to Fragrance World and Love in Paris, for 35 AED per full set.
Arrange for the perfumes to be shipped via DDP (Delivered Duty Paid) air/express, ensuring delivery directly to the UK.
Requirements:

Must be based in Dubai/UAE with access to local wholesale markets.
Ability to secure wholesale prices comparable to or lower than local retail prices.
Experience in international shipping, particularly DDP air/express.
Knowledge of the perfume market in Dubai, including emerging and established brands.
Key Notes:

Retail prices in local stores are very affordable, and I expect to obtain similar or better pricing through wholesale channels.
The focus is on securing high-quality perfumes at the best possible prices.
If you have the necessary connections and expertise to fulfil this role, please get in touch with your proposal, including your experience and how you can meet these requirements.
estimate_desc: Hourly-Expert-Est. time: 1 to 3 months, Less than 30 hrs/week-

title: Capital Advisors For A Commercial Lending Firm
description:
THIS IS A COMMISSION ONLY POSITION

Hasan Enterprises is a commercial lending firm specializing in providing tailored financial solutions to experienced investors and real estate professionals. With a focus on refinancing existing debt and facilitating acquisitions, we partner with clients to maximize their investment potential. We are expanding our team and looking for a driven Capital Advisor to help us grow our portfolio of clients.

Job Description:
As a Capital Advisor, you will play a critical role in driving the growth of our business by identifying and securing new leads that match our ideal customer profile. You will work closely with investors and real estate professionals who have active portfolios and are seeking to refinance their existing debt or obtain financing for new property acquisitions.

Key Responsibilities:
- Lead Generation: Identify and target experienced investors and real estate professionals who have active portfolios and are in need of refinancing or acquisition financing.
- Client Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with potential clients, understanding their financial needs, investment goals, and challenges.
- Market Research: Stay informed about market trends, real estate developments, and investment opportunities to better serve clients and provide informed advice.
- Networking: Attend industry events, seminars, and conferences to expand your network and generate leads.
- Reporting: Regularly report on lead generation activities, pipeline status, and deal progress to management.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Proven experience in commercial lending, real estate finance, or a related field.
- Strong network of contacts within the real estate investment community.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with a knack for building relationships.
- Ability to understand complex financial products and tailor solutions to client needs.
- Self-motivated, goal-oriented, and able to work independently.
- Familiarity with market trends, investment strategies, and financial analysis.
- Bachelor's degree in finance, business, real estate, or a related field is preferred.

Growth Opportunities:
- Team Building: After successfully closing a set number of deals and demonstrating consistent performance over a certain period of time, you will have the opportunity to build and lead your own team of Capital Advisors.
- Override Incentives: As a team leader, you will earn an override on deals closed by your team members, providing additional income potential as you grow your team.

Compensation: This is a commission only position
- Non-Originated Deals: Capital Advisors will receive 30% of the transaction fee collected by Hasan Enterprises for transactions resulting from deals not self-originated by the Capital Advisor.
- Self-Originated Deals: Capital Advisors will receive 50% of the transaction fee collected by Hasan Enterprises for transactions resulting from deals they have self-originated.
estimate_desc: Hourly-Intermediate-Est. time: More than 6 months, 30+ hrs/week-

title: Email Marketing & Email Templates
description:
**Position Overview:**
We are seeking a talented and detail-oriented Email Marketing Specialist to join our dynamic marketing team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in email marketing, with expertise in lead management, template design, and campaign execution. You will play a critical role in enhancing our email marketing strategy by cleaning and segmenting our leads, designing engaging email templates, and managing our weekly email campaigns.

**Key Responsibilities:**

- **Lead Management:** Clean and segment our email lists to ensure high deliverability and engagement rates.
- **Email Template Creation:** Design visually appealing and responsive email templates that align with our brand and marketing goals.
- **Campaign Management:** Plan, execute, and monitor three email campaigns per week, ensuring timely delivery and alignment with our marketing calendar.
- **Performance Analysis:** Analyze campaign performance metrics and report on key insights to optimize future campaigns.
- **A/B Testing:** Conduct A/B testing on subject lines, content, and design to continuously improve engagement and conversion rates.
- **Collaboration:** Work closely with the marketing team to align email campaigns with overall marketing strategies and initiatives.

**Qualifications:**

- Proven experience in email marketing, preferably in a similar role.
- Proficiency in email marketing platforms .
- Strong understanding of email best practices, including deliverability, segmentation, and compliance with regulations (e.g., GDPR, CAN-SPAM).
- Excellent writing and editing skills, with a keen eye for detail.
- Ability to analyze data and derive actionable insights for campaign improvement.
- Creative mindset and ability to design engaging email content.
- Strong organizational skills, with the ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines.

**What We Offer:**

- Competitive salary and benefits.
- Opportunity to work in a fast-paced and innovative environment.
- Professional development and growth opportunities.
- A collaborative and supportive team culture.
-potential for full time . We are going to try a monthly trial.

If you are passionate about email marketing and are ready to make an impact, we would love to hear from you! Please send your resume and a message.
estimate_desc: Hourly-Expert-Est. time: 1 to 3 months, Less than 30 hrs/week-

title: Inside Sales Agent
description:
About Us:
We are seeking a dedicated freelance sales agent to join our team and help us expand our accounting client base within the healthcare industry. Our company specializes in providing top-notch financial services to small healthcare organizations in Houston, offering a unique value proposition that combines quality reporting and insight comparable to Fortune 500 companies with personalized support and coaching.

Target Customer:
We are looking for organizations within the healthcare sector with the following criteria:

- Annual revenue ranging from $200,000 to $3 million.
- Types of health care companies, including home health, group homes, senior care facilities, hospice, dialysis centers, assisted living facilities, urgent care centers, pharmacies, and other small health care businesses.
- Organizations with fewer than 20 employees.

Sales Channels:
As our freelance sales agent, you will be responsible for identifying potential clients through various channels, including but not limited to:

- Google Maps and Google search.
- Professional organizations.
- LinkedIn, Facebook, and Instagram.
- Leveraging your network for referrals.

Unique Value Proposition:
Our company takes pride in delivering "Ferrari services at Ford prices." We are committed to providing small businesses in the health care industry with high-quality reporting, financial insights, and personalized support. Our services include:

- Basic bookkeeping and standard QuickBooks reporting.
- Google Spreadsheet reporting.
- Executive dashboarding.
- Payroll services.
- Ad-hoc analysis and custom reporting.
- Standard virtual CFO packages.
- Medicare cost reports.
- SBA loan preparation.
- Medicare and private insurance billing.

Standard Pricing:
Our pricing is competitive and tailored to the specific needs of our clients. Here are some of our standard pricing models:

- Bookkeeping / Standard QB Reporting: Starting at $200 per month (varies based on transaction volume).
- Google Spreadsheet Reporting: Starting at $100 per month (varies based on transaction volume).
- Executive Dashboarding: Starting at $100 per month (varies based on transaction volume).
- Payroll: Starting at $200 per month (varies based on transaction volume).
- Ad-hoc Analysis / Custom Reporting: Custom pricing at approximately $35 per hour.
- Standard Virtual CFO Pack: $500 per month.
- Medicare Cost Reports: $1,000 (one-time fee).
- SBA Loan Preparation: Custom pricing at approximately $35 per hour.
- Medicare and Private Insurance Billing: Custom pricing.

Requirements:
To excel in this role, you should have:

- Experience in sales or a related field.
- Experience in CRM software
- Experience in Google Sheets
- Experience in Notion
- A Houston-based phone number
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
- The ability to identify and approach potential clients.
- Knowledge of the health care industry and its specific financial needs (preferred but not mandatory).

If you are a proactive and results-driven sales agent who is excited about helping small healthcare businesses thrive financially, we invite you to apply for this freelance position. Please reply with a Google Drive link to your resume.

We look forward to working with a motivated sales agent to drive our company's growth and success in the healthcare industry.
estimate_desc: Hourly: $5.00 - $40.00-Expert-Est. time: More than 6 months, 30+ hrs/week-

title: Talent Recruiter
description:
We are seeking an experienced and motivated Talent Recruiter to join our HR team. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in full-cycle recruiting, from talent sourcing and attracting candidates to interviewing and hiring great employees. The Talent Recruiter will collaborate with department managers on a regular basis and proactively identify future hiring needs. You should also be able to attract candidates using various sources, like social media networks and employee referrals.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop and update job descriptions and job specifications.
Prepare recruitment materials and post jobs to appropriate job boards and social media platforms.
Source and recruit candidates by using databases, social media, and other recruiting platforms.
Screen candidates' resumes and job applications.
Conduct interviews using various reliable recruiting and selection tools/methods to filter candidates within schedule.
Assess applicants’ relevant knowledge, skills, soft skills, experience, and aptitudes.
Act as a point of contact and build influential candidate relationships during the selection process.
Collaborate with hiring managers to understand the needs of the organization and the specifications of open positions.
Promote the company’s reputation as “best place to work”.
Provide analytical and well-documented recruiting reports to the rest of the team.
Stay updated on recruitment trends and best practices.
Qualifications:

Proven work experience as a Recruiter (either an in-house recruiter or a staffing agency recruiter).
Solid ability to conduct different types of interviews (structured, competency-based, stress, etc.).
Hands-on experience with various selection processes (phone interviewing, reference check, etc.).
Ability to organize skills assessment centers (in-tray activities, work samples, psychometric and IQ/EQ tests, etc.).
Familiarity with HR databases, Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS), and Candidate Management Systems (CMS).
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Strong decision-making skills.
BS/MS in Human Resources Management, Psychology, or relevant field.
Preferred Skills:

Knowledge of labor legislation.
Experience in hiring for a wide range of roles, from entry-level to executive positions.
estimate_desc: Hourly: $5.00 - $7.00-Expert-Est. time: More than 6 months, 30+ hrs/week-
